prompts: Create a unique Ice-type Pokemon with sharp, icy features and a frosty appearance.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a cube of ice, with a cute face and bright colors.
Show me an ice-themed Pokemon that has crystalline spikes and a playful demeanor.
Generate a tiny Pokemon that embodies the chill of winter, with a light blue color scheme.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a snowball, with vibrant eyes and a friendly expression.
Design an Ice-type creature that blends into its snowy environment and has a sparkling texture.
Give me a Pokemon with a frosty body and a round shape, perfect for icy habitats.
